Race.SpecificTitle: PW Public Health Unit -- 2.07 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Public Health Unit Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Evangeline Parish Public Health Unit of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a two and seven hundredths (2.07) mill tax on all property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning in the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028 (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $507,470.55), for the purpose of improving, maintaining, operating and supporting the Evangeline Parish Public Health Unit?

Race.SpecificTitle: Police Jury Ward No. 1 -- 1.12 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Police Jury Ward No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Evangeline Parish Police Jury Ward No. 1 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a one and twelve hundredths (1.12) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning in the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026 (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $79,141.24), for the purpose of maintaining and upkeeping public cemeteries located therein?

Police Jury Ward No. 4 Proposition
(New Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the Evangeline Parish Police Jury Ward No. 4 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a two (2) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning in the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026 (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $107,456.57), for the purpose of maintaining and upkeeping public cemeteries located therein?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Ville Platte -- 9.76 Mills Continuation - CC - 15 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Ville Platte Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Ville Platte, Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "City"), be authorized to continue to levy a nine and seventy-six hundredths (9.76) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the City, for a period of fifteen (15) years, beginning in the year 2017 and ending with the year 2031 (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $348,187.90), for the purpose of maintaining and improving public streets, sidewalks and alleys and for constructing, improving and maintaining drains and drainage facilities within and for the City?
